author: Special Correspondent
title: Some IT, biotech firms, government offices can work with a third of workforce from tomorrow
description: Chief Minister, however, urges other companies to encourage employees to work from home; restrictions on vehicles to continue; no sale of liquor
content: Following the Union Home Ministrys guidelines, the Karnataka government on Saturday announced some relaxation measures in the COVID-19 lockdown, including allowing a maximum of one third of the workforce in the information technology (IT) and biotechnology (B… [+4243 chars]
